Potential 1.title: Arts Talent
Potential 1.description: Ultimate Overclocked Moment improved: Electric Amp and Heat Amp effects are increased to 1.1 times the original.

Potential 2.title: Improved Automation
Potential 2.description: Ultimate Overclocked Moment improved: Ultimate Energy cost -10%.

Potential 3.title: Applied Originium Theory
Potential 3.description: When an enemy with an active Focus debuff is defeated, return 15 SP.

Potential 5.title: High Specs Tech Tester
Potential 5.description: Applying Focus on the same target for 20s increases Electric Susceptibility and Heat Susceptibility effects by 4%.
